name: Shoot The Bird
description:
The goal of this game is simple: shoot down the bird with the cannon. Be careful, as you only have one shot.

Developed using the Godot engine, licensed under the MIT license

Uses the Pixel Operator font by Jayvee Enaguas (HarvettFox96), licensed under the CC0 license

Art, Sound, Design, and Scripting was done by me (LRFLEW)
